title: List of Sasanian revolts and civil wars
text: This is a list of <a href="civil%20war">civil war</a>s or other organized internal civil unrests fought during the history of the <a href="Sasanian%20Empire">Sasanian Empire</a> (224–651). The definition of organized civil unrest is any conflict that was fought within the borders of the Sasanian Empire, with at least one opposition leader against the ruling government.
